content.en: Optimizing image segmentation: Researchers have been exploring the use of various algorithms to improve the segmentation of colored satellite images and color image multilevel thresholding. These algorithms include the cuckoo search algorithm, differential evolution algorithm, wind driven optimization, particle swarm optimization, Harris Hawks Optimization, modified Moth-Flame Optimization, Dragonfly Algorithm, Water Cycle Algorithm, Oppositional Symbiotic Organisms Search Optimization, energy curve-based thresholding, beta differential evolution algorithm, krill herd algorithm, modified whale optimization algorithm, Kapur entropy-based optimization, fuzzy entropy-based optimization, adaptive whale optimization algorithm, local minima avoidance method, firefly algorithm, chimp optimization algorithm, and electromagnetism optimization algorithm. These algorithms aim to enhance the accuracy and efficiency of image segmentation by leveraging nature-inspired optimization techniques.
content.da: Optimering af billedsegmentering: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre segmenteringen af farvede satellitbilleder og multilevel-thresholding af farvebilleder. Disse algoritmer inkluderer cuckoo search algoritmen, differential evolution algoritmen, vinddreven optimering, partikel-sværm optimering, Harris Hawks Optimering, modificeret Moth-Flame Optimering, Dragonfly Algoritmen, Vandcyklus Algoritmen, Oppositional Symbiotic Organisms Search Optimering, energiafhængige thresholding, beta differential evolution algoritmen, krill herd algoritmen, modificeret hval optimeringsalgoritme, Kapur's entropi-baseret optimering, fuzzy entropi-baseret optimering, adaptiv hval optimeringsalgoritme, lokal minima undgåelsesmetode, ildflue algoritmen, chimp optimeringsalgoritmen og elektromagnetisme optimeringsalgoritmen. Disse algoritmer har til formål at forbedre nøjagtigheden og effektiviteten af billedsegmentering ved at udnytte naturinspirerede optimeringsteknikker.
